text: @realDonaldTrump 25,981 Americans are DEAD as of 10:24 pm EST 4/14 because YOU knew about the coronavirus months ago & failed to take it seriously! YOU eliminated pandemic protections President @BarackObama had in place! Be a man for once in your life  & take responsibility for your incompetence!
